entry.title: Saturday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High 8. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries early this morning. 30 percent chance of rain showers late this afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High 8. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Saturday 22 April 2023
